Summary



Tata’s consumer telecom business to merge with Bharti AirtelTCS beats estimates on client wins, digital servicesSun Pharma to increase shareholding in Ranbaxy MalaysiaShriram EPC bagged multiple orders worth Rs 349 crore






The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of Nifty 50 Index’s performance in India, fell 0.13 percent to 10,113 as of 7:30 a.m.

title: Stocks To Watch: Bharti Airtel, Reliance Industries, Sun Pharma, TCS
